Description.Name: BA Stealth Armor
Description.Details: Instead of using a dedicated ECM Suite to provide the stealth capabilities, the Stealth Armor used on battle armor is essentially a scaled up version of the sneak suits long used by special forces and intelligence agencies. Engineers were able to incorporate the small IR and ECM baffling systems directly into the armor, eliminating the need for a dedicated ECM Suite. BA Stealth Armor provides immunity to sensor sweeps and locks, increases evasion gained, and increases direct defense against enemy attacks. It also reduces unit visibility on the battlefield.
